Controllers Views Module

class proteus.controllers.views.ViewsController(app)

Views controller class where view controller actions are located.

export_view()

Exports view.

focus_object(object_id: str)

Focuses object in visualizers. This method is called from the tree view. It is used to scroll to the object in the visualizer.

Parameters:

object_id – Id of the object to focus.

print_view()

Prints view.

update_views()

Updates views.

proteus.controllers.views.get_views_folder() → str

Method that returns the views folder.

proteus.controllers.views.load_views() → list

Method that loads the views.
